solution_line_template: If each building floor has {apartments_per_floor} apartments, we have {num_stories} floors * {apartments_per_floor} apartments/floor = <<{num_stories}*{apartments_per_floor}={total_apartments}>>{total_apartments} apartments.

If each apartment has {people_per_apartment} people, {total_apartments} apartments * {people_per_apartment} people/apartment = <<{total_apartments}*{people_per_apartment}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
